channel.title: Chatoic Rapier 317
channel.description:
[b]---------------------------CLOSED-----------------[/b] Ok so I am now adding the chaotic rapier to my server. In the item.cfg (server side (not like it is in the client side)) I need the stats for it. Heres what I have: (I have custom ID and price set for assault points) item = 8020 Chaotic_Rapier A_weapon_of_amazing_speed. 500 500 500 Sorry about the spacing typos. Can you please tell me the other stats? --------------------------------Thanks pimple-----------------
what the hell does c:\ mean?

item.title: Chatoic Rapier 317
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

[quote=“moerin, post:5, topic:371341”][quote author=triger545 link=topic=467428.msg3417815#msg3417815 date=1291251534]

Noob:

what the hell does c:\ mean?

Is this seriously? Yes: c: means Cdrive, it’s in your computer.
Mines says: ACER(C:)

I know. This is just a quote that is posted everywhere. Lol thats why I said Noob: before it.
[/quote]
Maybe you meant: Noob question ;)[/quote]

Ya thats it. A noob would ask that.

Read full topic
